attributes.action: bring back capital punishment with immediate effect for any child killer or paedophile.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Laws in this country currently protect the law breakers, not the victims - let's face it, the worst that will happen to the monsters who killed both Baby P and Amy Howson, is a jail sentence with all bills paid for and counselling to try and change their way of thinking....Baby P and Amy paid with their lives.  So should they.  If an dog bit a child it would be put down.  So should these parasites.  So instead of letting them hide behind their so-called human rights, do the right thing for once and put us all out of our misery.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
